metadataAttributes.Title: Supply Chain Finance and Blockchain Technology Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Master Supply Chain Finance & Blockchain. Learn how to assess, sell and implement Supply Chain Finance programs using cutting edge technology.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Blockchain Technology Implementation, Foreign Currency Risk Management, Accounts Receivable Management, Accounts Payable Management, Trade Finance Management, Marketing Supply Chain Finance Services, Designing a Supply Chain Finance Program, Risk Management of Supply Chain Finance, Financial Innovation, Blockchain Implementation in Supply Chain Finance, APIs for Trade Finance, Managing Accounts Receivable and Accounts Payable with Blockchain,
